reviews.sentence: Good place to sleep. Pedestrian accommodations. Good location. Staff a little gruff. Lowe your expectations and you will not be disappointed. If all you want is a clean bed and a serviceable kitchenette at relatively reasonable rates you will appreciate this place. Inexpensive. Pool decent. Great location. Lots to do near here. Snorkeling fishing jet skis theatre of the sea. Hour to everglades. Good restaurants in a tea. Some paint. New carpets. Better door lock. Refrigerator chirping all the time.

Little to be desired. Overall Islamorada is a beautiful place. We arrived at the hotel around 130 and thought maybe we could check in a little early to change clothes and get out in the sun. The man at the front desk who I did not know at the time is the owner with a smile on his face rudely said check in is at 3 it should have been on your reservation and it is on the front door. Hm welcome to the hotel. This hotel is just about what we expected after reading other reviews. It is your typical old Florida hotel. Nothing fancy not entirely clean but relatively comfortable. The bathroom needed some serious attention. We knew we were not going to be spending much time in a hotel room so we were not concerned about staying in a top notch facility. The pool is convenient and has a nice view. In hindsight I would spend a little more and make a better choice.

Beware. Rundown place see pictures but the worse thing is how RUDE Staff is including a called manager that dint even introduced herself by name. clerk refused to provide receipts for services and check out receipt. Very Very Rude with lack of hospitality training view Great location nice restaurants. Demolish and build a nice facility with trained and educated staff.

Not fancy but gorgeous view. The reviews had me scared when friends made the reservation but overall we had a blast. They really need to invest in remodeling. If you are looking for luxury this is not it. The room was clean but things like the very rusty refrigerator can be a turn off. On the other hand the place is right on the water the staff are mostly friendly only problem was friends staying there who were not out precisely at 11 were sort of given the bums rush rather than politely requested to please vacate.
The front desk staff is rude as hell and very unhelpful. Nasty staff.

Great location shame about the hotel. Well located being just 60 feet from the ocean. Very near to Theatre of the Sea. Surly unhelpful staff who gave us the impression that they thought their guests were a hindrance to their working day. Tiny room with no room on one side to get past the bed. Decrepit air conditioning unit. There is no breakfast option. Coffee in a flask from 830am was all you got. If you ask for hot water to make a cup of tea instead of a coffee you are met with a blank look.

Desk person drunk belligerent abusive argumentative. Please contact me I wish to make a formal complaint and speak to expedia management. Even harbor lights fire extinguishers are out of date and expired the ones in glass cases outside of rooms. No fire extinguishers. Lots of use of boat ramp by non guests that could not launch their boats eficienctly so they blocked my room parking spaces all morning when I was supposed to be checking out so had to pay 500 late check out fee. Day ramp user took my land boat parking space with his Mercedes n jet ski trailer so had to disconnect his jet ski trailer move it by hand across the parking lot to back my 26 footer boat into its parking space n still double parked my suburban beside his Mercedes but left him room to get ot thereHave photos of horrible problems n room Please make formal contact with me there is much MORE.

Dirty room with rude staff. Next to the Beach. The staff was so rude because of their mistake assigning our room to another person. Then the staff wanted to see my wifes ID even though the room was in my name. The staff was not friendly. Later she realized her mistake and blamed the new staff.
Poor. Nothing. Bed bugs too close to highway. This is not a real calculation becausethis site adds in the decent staff ratingto up the score. This 2 star motel deservesbarely one star.

Okay. It took over an hour to get a bus to pick us up from the airport to get a ride back to the hotel. I called and the lady at the hotel front desk lied to me that the bus was in traffic when there was only 10 minutes max traffic time. I was completely turned off because of this and I was not impressed with the service.
Great staff and view.

Amazing trip. Just had an amazing experience at the Fisher Inn. Recently went up with my family and had a great time. Customer service was exceptional. They treated us VERY well. DOG FRIENDLY. Our dog was in paradise. Family had complete access to the kayaks paddle boards and beach area. This is a brand new hotel so everything was absolutely clean and the staff was amazing. Manager did his job very well. Ca n’t wait to come back later this year.
Exceptional. Staff rooms decor beautiful spotless. It was all good.

Great Place. Highly recommend. Great location great staff and very cute décor. Beautiful beach area and pool. Prices include SUP. Unfortunately the weather was a little too cool for that. Would definitely stay here again.
Exceptional. Beautiful scenery. Very clean. Excellent customer service. No complaints at all.

Nice but Pricey. Pros. The rooms are all newly refurbished with a contemporary breezy marine theme and colors. The girl who worked the front desk while we were there Emily had a great attitude and demeanor. The mattresses were comfy but the double beds were a bit small for two people. The whole facility felt clean and well maintained. The continental breakfast was basic but a nice option. The recreational equipment was new and free to use. Cons. The kitchenette has no equipment other than a K cup brewer and a microwave no plates mugs glasses or flatware. The balconies tend to trap the road noise acousticaly and amplify it. You must keep the AC unit on high to drown out the street noise and it takes a bit of fooling around with the AC remote to figure out how to turn off the very bright. lighted temperature numbers on the front of the unit. The pool is small and basically adequate but once the kids arrive it gets a bit cramped feeling. Double beds smaller than a queen but clean and comfortable. No elevator. I felt sorry for the people with babies strollers. This was my first trip to the Keys so maybe all the refurbished facilities are expensive but for 250 fees 300 per night I am not sure we would stay again.

Quaint tranquility in the middle of it all. We stayed in a villa at Fisher Inn. It was on the beach with a beautiful ocean view. It was incredibly clean too. This was our first time staying here and we loved it. It felt quaint but had really nice accommodations and amenities. It was quiet and the staff was great. We will definitely be returning. We have stayed at other pricier places in Islamorada but Fisher Inn is just as worthy. it is a tranquil piece of paradise that is still pretty low on tourists radar. I am sure that will change quickly. Great place highly recommend. We will be back.

My friend and I stayed here last night. We stopped on a whim to check it out. We were greeted by very friendly front desk people. They showed us a room and we booked it immediately. The rates were very reasonable. The rooms were very clean with a great view. They were also decorated really cute. The beds were SO comfortable that we did nt want to leave. We also got to meet the owners and they were extremely friendly. The property is very nice with a beach area hammocks and a pool. We will definitely be back.

Great. I am a musician that travels to the Keys for Destination Weddings. I have stayed at this hotel before the remodel. Renovation is great. Very clean simple and has a modern look. Staff was super nice and very accommodating. My only complaint is I did not have enough time to stay and enjoy the amenities. I will definitely put this on my list of places to return.

Chic clean motel style stay would recommend. Adorable and chic hotel in a convenient location. Loved the decor and the staff were really great about helping me with a late check out after scuba diving. Super cute vibe spacious rooms and great little spot to lounge by the pool. The walls were a little thin but to be expected in a motel style stay.
